reference.shortdesc: The area element describes a linkable area within an imagemap. It allows the author to specify a shape within the image, the coordinates of that shape, and a link target for the area.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The area element is specialized from div. It in defined in the utilities-domain module.
